replies.author: Salt_lovely
replies.txt_content:
How do I install this plugin?
Download the plugin.
Stop your BungeeCord server
Go to your BungeeCord server files
Drag this plugin in your plugins folder
Set the permissions in the config.yml from you BungeeCord server.
Start your BungeeCord server.
翻译一下：
下载插件关闭BC服打开BC服文件夹把插件塞进plugins文件夹配置你的BC服的config.yml里面的权限打开BC服

我猜你是卡在第五步了？
https://github.com/AuraDevelopmentTeam/BungeeChat2/wiki/Permissions

推荐给权限：

bungeechat.command.global        使用/global指令
bungeechat.command.global.toggle        使用/global指令开关全服聊天状态
